testcase.name: User Login
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to 'url'.....................................................passed When Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click 'Signup / Login' button...........................................passed And Verify 'Login to your account' is visible...............................passed And Enter correct email address and password................................passed And Click 'login' button....................................................passed And Verify 'Logged in as username' is visible...............................passed And Click 'Delete Account' button...........................................passed And Verify 'ACCOUNT DELETED!' is visible....................................passed
